metadata.title: CVE-2018-1051 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.description:
It was found that the fix for CVE-2016-9606 in versions 3.0.22 and 3.1.2was incomplete and Yaml unmarshalling in Resteasy is still possible via`Yaml.load()` in YamlProvider.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1051` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libresteasy-java - 3.6.2-2
No subscription required

libresteasy3.0-java - 3.0.26-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: resteasy package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.2-2').
resteasy3.0 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.26-1').
